entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy. Rain or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain in the morning. Blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
